A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This movie wasn't all bad\, I think parts of it should even be a shoo in for some awards....

Worst script = Rian Johnson
Obvious product placement = Porgs
Most likely to make you miss Jar Jar Binks = Rose
Biggest in-your-face feminazi = Purple haired lady
Most underused character = Chewbacca
Cringiest kiss ever laid in a movie = Rose again
Lamest death scene = Snoke
Worst character assassination = Luke
Laugh-out-loud scene that wasn't supposed to be funny = Leia Poppins
Most annoyingly patronizing speech ever given = Rose for the trifecta!

So please stop with your "this was awful" and "The Last Jedi ruined my childhood".   Instead\, eat the tripe Disney has given us and don't forget to say thank you!
